description: This file defines the 'ChatsListScreen' React component for a chat application, displaying a list of chat conversations, handling refresh and navigation to individual chat screens and contacts.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches chat data from the API and updates the state, used for initial load and pull-to-refresh.

methods.name: renderItem
methods.description: Renders each chat item in the list, displaying avatar, title, last message, and timestamp.
